items.title: Anthropic Has Some Key Advice for Businesses in the Aftermath of a Massive AI Cyberattack
items.description: The attack involved hackers tricking Anthropic’s AI tool, Claude Code. Around 30 companies, institutions, and agencies were targeted.

items.title: How Jim Rowley’s Military Training Helped Save Crunch Fitness
items.description: Rowley took Crunch Fitness from bankruptcy to a spot on the Inc. 5000 this year. It hasn’t been an easy ride.
